title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Remote Laboratory-Based Physics Multirepresentational Ability Improvement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: It is possible to accurately convert experimental data into linguistic/visual/mathematical representations and demonstrate analytical skills.

Learners analyze one real-world healthcare/nursing problem (e.g., patient monitoring system optimization) using remote lab tools (e.g., LabChart, Labster), then design and execute a 3-step project plan (goals, methodology, metrics) within four weeks.

Learners observe peers’ multimodal communication (verbal/nonverbal, documentation) in team-based scenarios (e.g., patient case discussions) using five criteria (clarity, accuracy, timeliness, empathy, structure), provide ≥3 feedbacks with 5-point rubric-based improvements.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
